thread.title: RANDALL
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by RANDALL

author: RANDALL
title: RANDALL
text: Only shopping for a recliner. The quality appears very nice and the price was right. There was adequate selections to choose from in various levels, materials and cost. We were allowed to shop without pressure and product information was easily obtained from our salesperson who was always nearby. Have not received the chair yet so no in home usage but feel comfortable with the purchase.
